Articles.Content:
Sorry if this has been asked 100 times before, but is there a keyboard shortcut for QuickSearch? (i.e. that sets focus to the search box and highlights or clears any existing text in it?)
I couldn't find an answer in the OP or changelog at GitHub.

If not, could you add one? Also when focus is in the searchbox, binding the ESCAPE key to the "back" button would be great.

[quote name='kjub']Thank you very much for a reply! I am following you on kerbalstuff now and surely get back to QuickRevert as soon as it is life again. ;][/QUOTE]

;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;;.;

(Malah, are you soften up? Does hordes of crying kerbals make you feel sorry? :P)

Close to two weeks without KSP... Addiction hunger is glancing at me. ;]
Just to be clear - I'm not rushing you, just fighting with my own addiction and this post seems to help a little bit :D.
I've screwed up one long mission without QuickRevert and I'll have to start my career from the beginning which I don't want to do without QuickRevert for obvious reasons.
So I hope you'll understand me here! ;)

[quote name='Fwiffo']Sorry if this has been asked 100 times before, but is there a keyboard shortcut for QuickSearch? (i.e. that sets focus to the search box and highlights or clears any existing text in it?)
I couldn't find an answer in the OP or changelog at GitHub.

If not, could you add one? Also when focus is in the searchbox, binding the ESCAPE key to the "back" button would be great.[/QUOTE]
Good idea, I will planned it.

(Malah, are you soften up? Does hordes of crying kerbals make you feel sorry? :P)

Close to two weeks without KSP... Addiction hunger is glancing at me. ;]
Just to be clear - I'm not rushing you, just fighting with my own addiction and this post seems to help a little bit :D.
I've screwed up one long mission without QuickRevert and I'll have to start my career from the beginning which I don't want to do without QuickRevert for obvious reasons.
So I hope you'll understand me here! ;)[/QUOTE]
Sorry, and it seems that it only needs a compilation ;)

v1.21 - 2015.11.24
[list][*] New: Added an option to disable the on hover function,
[*] New: Added a timer of 1 second to hide the hovering of the QuickGoTo toolbar,
[*] Fix: Some minor bug,
[*] Compiled against KSP 1.0.5[/list]

[quote name='Malah']Sorry, and it seems that it only needs a compilation ;)[/QUOTE]

o.O It was just cruel! ;)

But honest, thank you Malah very much. :) You've made my day (well, technically, evening)
Don't mean to be a nag.  Any keyboard shortcuts?  For what it's worth, I did figure out Tab moves between textboxes (i.e. craft title and search box).

Hi,

Quick Mute's activation key (F6) is conflicting with AutomatedScreenshots key.  Is it possible to change it to a different one?

35 minutes ago, linuxgurugamer said:

Hi,

Quick Mute's activation key (F6) is conflicting with AutomatedScreenshots key.  Is it possible to change it to a different one?

Hello, as explain on the OP, you can change it on the configfile which is created after the first launch of QuickMute. The config file is "GameData/QuickMute/Config.txt". Sorry, I will not change his default key which already has been changed in the past for a conflict with new KSP functions.
As long as there is a way to change it.  You may want to consider adding a small GUI so it can be changed in-game rather than having to edit a file
@Malah, I know QuickMute is listed as finished, but would it trouble you a lot to add Chatterer mod support? Right now, QuickMute doesn't Mute sounds from Chatterer.

KSP 1.0.5, Quick Goto v1.21

My Quick Goto icon isvisible in the Admin Building and Mission Control but it doesn't drop down the options when I hover over them.  It works in the Space Centre and VAB.  What might I be doing wrong?

On 14/12/2015 at 1:15 AM, aluc24 said:

@Malah, I know QuickMute is listed as finished, but would it trouble you a lot to add Chatterer mod support? Right now, QuickMute doesn't Mute sounds from Chatterer.

Thanks for this report, I will work on it.

1 hour ago, Brigadier said:

KSP 1.0.5, Quick Goto v1.21

My Quick Goto icon isvisible in the Admin Building and Mission Control but it doesn't drop down the options when I hover over them.  It works in the Space Centre and VAB.  What might I be doing wrong?

Yes, it's a bug, I saw it a week ago, and I will correct it soon, thanks for the report

Edited December 25, 2015 by Malah

deserve so much rating

 

QuickSearch is damn useful, and quick goto is a nice bit of icing.

29 minutes ago, CorBlimey said:

deserve so much rating

 

QuickSearch is damn useful, and quick goto is a nice bit of icing.

Thanks, but I think QuickSearch will no more has update, a feature like this will be in KSP 1.1

23 hours ago, Malah said:

Thanks, but I think QuickSearch will no more has update, a feature like this will be in KSP 1.1

yes I heard so too.

But take that as a compliment that Squad decided something like it was so useful

Edited January 21, 2016 by CorBlimey

Just here to say that I think QuickScroll is absolutely fantastic!!
Seriously, if I forget to install it then I think the game is broken!

Finally, I've added a new feature to QuickSearch, I don't know if it will be useless with KSP 1.1 ... just wait

This update causes all the dialog buttons to disappear from popup Windows; examples: far editor window, quick exit, action groups (with action groups extended, don't know about normally). Deleting the mod brought them back.  Log file did not show any errors that I could find related to quick search.

2 hours ago, armegeddon said:

This update causes all the dialog buttons to disappear from popup Windows; examples: far editor window, quick exit, action groups (with action groups extended, don't know about normally). Deleting the mod brought them back.  Log file did not show any errors that I could find related to quick search.

 

Same problem here.

Even affects the "load" button etc. in the VAB.

Edited February 8, 2016 by TrooperCooper
Also same problem here, after updating, I could not purchase a research part in the tech tree, because the "research" and "Cancel" buttons were gone.. only alt+f4 worked..

6 hours ago, armegeddon said:

This update causes all the dialog buttons to disappear from popup Windows; examples: far editor window, quick exit, action groups (with action groups extended, don't know about normally). Deleting the mod brought them back.  Log file did not show any errors that I could find related to quick search.

Yes, same here. Please fix.
Thanks, for these reports, I work on them.

On 2/8/2016 at 9:43 AM, blnk2007 said:

Yes, same here. Please fix.

Thanks for fixing!

The spacedock links for QuickStart and QuickExit don't work, they give me a 401 Unauthorized.

All the others load fine.

Also, thanks for these great little mods!

 

Edit: just installed QuickExit and I set it not to use a countdown but it still counts down

Edited February 22, 2016 by parachutingturtle
